title: Games not showing up on match history as if they never happened!
body:
I played 3 games of normal draft with Sion, Leblanc and leblanc again. it was W-L-W but none of the matches are on my match history. i have restarted the client, nothing. leblanc and sion are both noxian champions but the mission The Howl of Noxus (4/10) was not updated. the players who played with me in the sion game are in the Recently Played With section of the Add friends poppup but there is no other evidence of the games having been played. Something is wrong and it needs to be fixed.
The games were played between  09;00 and 13;00 (GMT+2)  EUW server
:(

In case it is necessary, this is a list of the players who played with and against me in the sion game:
**allies**
Saitzvouck - Yasuo
League of Lagz - Kindred
OlafiderSchlaffi - Fiddlesticks
ZeroTwoDesu - Vayne
ReaperDemonFix - Sion
**enemies:**
AzeHaiden - Gangplank
ThatWasEpic - Jhin
exterminator9 - Aatrox
xAmako - Janna
Fiya Ikheriya - Kayn

replies.body: Sorry for diggin it up but i have that problem too. I played jinx, won it, and it's not showing in my match history. I have the previous game with jinx that is also a win but the one i played few minutes before is not there. sorry for any mistakes, poor eng.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

I just checked the profiles of the players in my sion game, and their match histories show no trace of that game. 
also, the kayn player is actually "**Fiya lkheriya**"
They are already aware of the problems of missions and match history not being recorded and are working on it.
